item.title: All about kubernetes

item.title: how to stop docker that always restart
item.description: googling: https://www.google.com/search?q=docker+restart+always+stop https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39072357/how-to-stop-a-docker-container-which-started-with-restart-always/39072476 You can update docker container.use sudo docker update –restart=no  to update –restart flag of the container.Now you can stop the container.

item.title: simple alert monitoring using simplemonitor
item.description:

EOFdocker-compose up -d ref: https://simplemonitor.readthedocs.io/en/feature-docs/getting-started.html#writing-configuration-files
